description: Amazing Stories, volume 21, number 6 (June 1947). Scanned copy of a pulp magazine published by Ziff-Davis Publishing Company and edited by Raymond Palmer. Periodical copyright not renewed. Individual contributions' copyrights not renewed. This magazine and its contents are now in the public domain due to lack of copyright renewal. Featuring: Formula from the Underworld, Zigor Mephisto's Collection of Mentalia, Witch's Daughter, and The Red Legion; all by Richard Sharpe Shaver.
